models.name: Node Distance
models.lambda: function (type, feature) { var LondonEye = [530629.9181099398, 179433.27356557376]; var maxDistance = 52711.86727286523; return type === 'Road Node' && { value: vector.distance(feature.point, LondonEye) / maxDistance }; }

models.name: Link Length
models.lambda: function (type, feature) { var logMaxLength = Math.log(3772.593941606797); return type === 'Road Link' && { value: Math.log(feature.length) / logMaxLength }; }
